title: Self-promotion for Authors
description: "Self-Promotion for Authors," a step-by-step guide to promoting your next book in a professional manner. Learn how book publishing professionals maximize their time and efforts to reach prospective purchasers. Written by Larry Moniz, an award-winning national publicist whose clients included Coleco's Cabbage Patch Kids (for which the agency won a Silver Anvil Award, the highest accolade in public relations) Harlequin Romances, Shorewood Fine Art Books and several authors.
author: Larry Moniz
